issue.message: This call is to a method from API 16, the call containing class androidx.activity.result.contract.ActivityResultContracts.GetMultipleContents is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 16. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(16) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(16).

This call is to a method from API 19, the call containing class null is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 19. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(19) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(19).
